headline: Rivian Stock Jumps. It Has 1 More Thing in Common With Tesla.
summary: The electric-vehicle startup Rivian Automotive has followed EV leader  Tesla  in a few ways, including as a source of controversy among analysts on Wall Street.  Rivian shares were up 2.8% in early trading on Wednesday at $16.93, while the  and  were up 0.6% and 0.5%, respectively.  The move came after Edmunds named the Rivian R1T pickup its top-rated electric truck for 2026.

headline: Ford Weighs Global EV Alliances As Valuation Sits Near Fair Value
summary: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) is in talks with US officials and Chinese EV makers about joint ventures that would allow Chinese brands to build cars in the US under American majority control. Management is also exploring European collaborations, including potential work with Geely, alongside a pivot toward simpler, lower cost EVs for US buyers. These discussions point to a shift in how Ford approaches EV technology sourcing, global partnerships, and manufacturing costs. For investors tracking NYSE:F,...

headline: Ford refuses to shy away from EVs despite $19.5 billion cost
